ftp.server.command

Class FTPConnectionNeededCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • ftp.shared.FTPMessageSender

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FTPCommand
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FTPCdupCommand, FTPCwdCommand, FTPDeleCommand, FTPEprtCommand, FTPEpsvCommand, FTPListCommand, FTPNlstCommand, FTPPasvCommand, FTPPortCommand, FTPPwdCommand, FTPRetrCommand, FTPStorCommand

    public abstract class FTPConnectionNeededCommand
extends FTPBasicCommand
    A connection needed command is a command which is valid and needs the client to be connected in order to execute itself
